Welcome to PT Safari Karya Maju!

Commitment, Hope, and Gratitude

Since 2000, CV. Safari Karya Maju, which later transformed into PT. Safari Karya Maju, has been a major pillar in the sheet metal processing and fabrication industry in Indonesia. We are proud to provide the best solutions with superior quality based on our core company values: INTEGRITY, INNOVATION, and WINNING SPIRIT.

At PT. Safari Karya Maju, we consider integrity as the primary foundation in every interaction with our customers, partners, and stakeholders. We uphold a firm commitment to always act with honesty, transparency, and responsibility.

The spirit of innovation flows in every aspect of our operations. We do not just follow industry trends, but also pioneer in leading change. With a progressive approach and cutting-edge technology, we continuously innovate to meet the increasingly complex market demands.

For us, victory is not just an achievement, but a spirit to continuously grow and provide the best for our customers. We value every opportunity to learn and develop, as well as building sustainable and mutually beneficial relationships.

We invite you to explore more about PT. Safari Karya Maju in this company profile. Let's together create a more brilliant future, because at PT. Safari Karya Maju, we are always committed to giving the best.

Claudemas Yefune, S.E.

Leader of PT Safari Karya Maju

VALUES.

INTEGRITY

Honest, uncompromising on falsehood/deviations, brave to be forthright and responsible. A commitment to character over personal gain, people over things, service over power, principles over pleasure, and a long-term perspective over short-term.

INNOVATION

Daring to change, clever in seeking, exploring, and finding innovative solutions. By cleverly seeking, exploring, discovering, and trying new ideas, and daring to change by always learning, practicing, and being able to apply technological developments to continuously improve mutual prosperity.

WINNING SPIRIT

We have the spirit of a winner by thinking like a winner, preparing to be a winner, working like a winner, and having the determination to continuously learn, practice, and be able to deliver increasingly better results every day.

VALUES.
